## QueryStateConfig interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface QueryStateConfig<Service> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cacheKey?](./query-state.querystateconfig.cachekey.md) | (params: { params: [DataParams](./query-state.dataparams.md)<!-- -->; queryParams: [DataParams](./query-state.dataparams.md)<!-- -->; }) =&gt; string | <i>(Optional)</i> Creates a key based on params to check the cache |
|  [disableCache?](./query-state.querystateconfig.disablecache.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Disable that results are cached |
|  [disableInitialLoad?](./query-state.querystateconfig.disableinitialload.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> By default, we're fetching the data on the initial load To prevent this, set this to <code>true</code> |
|  [ignore?](./query-state.querystateconfig.ignore.md) | (params: { params: [DataParams](./query-state.dataparams.md)<!-- -->; queryParams: [DataParams](./query-state.dataparams.md)<!-- -->; }) =&gt; boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> A decider function that decides whether to invoke the query By default all changes are sent to the query If the function returns <code>true</code>, the changes are ignored and the query isn't invoked |
|  [name](./query-state.querystateconfig.name.md) | string | The name of the component This is used to build up a cache |
|  [query?](./query-state.querystateconfig.query.md) | keyof Service | <i>(Optional)</i> The query method that is invoked. Defaults to <code>query</code>. |
|  [retryCondition?](./query-state.querystateconfig.retrycondition.md) | number \| ((retries: number) =&gt; boolean) | <i>(Optional)</i> Decide when to retry a failed query. Defaults to 3 times. |
|  [retryDelay?](./query-state.querystateconfig.retrydelay.md) | (retries: number) =&gt; number \| Date | <i>(Optional)</i> Set the delay between the retries. Defaults to an exponential retry with a starting delay of 1 second. |
|  [revalidateTriggers?](./query-state.querystateconfig.revalidatetriggers.md) | false \| [TriggerConfig](./query-state.triggerconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Triggers to refresh the current data |
